June 27

June 27

learnt how to use git today. pretty cool. i know have my own public repository on the project management tool i've been working on.

today's revisions include:
including different user roles: pm and non-pm
pm has privilege to add, delete, update tasks, add projects and tags
non-pm can only read, or update the status if they are the person responsible

to-do's for tomorrow:
get SSO auth working
get templates working
may start on ui
